name: OpenAI API
summary: API for text, image, and speech models; supports tool-using agents via developer-built runtimes.

name: Anthropic Claude
summary: Large language model family available via web and API through partners; used for chat and agent workflows.

name: Google Gemini
summary: Google’s model family available across products and APIs for multimodal tasks.

name: AWS Bedrock
summary: Managed service providing access to multiple foundation models with AWS-native security and governance.

name: Azure AI Foundry
summary: Azure services for building and deploying AI applications with model access, evaluation, and monitoring.

name: Vercel
summary: Frontend cloud platform for deploying Next.js apps with preview deployments and edge/network features.

name: Upstash Redis
summary: Serverless Redis compatible database with REST API; integrates with Vercel for storage and rate limiting.

name: Sentry
summary: Error tracking and performance monitoring for web and backend applications.

name: Datadog
summary: Monitoring platform for metrics, logs, traces, and security signals.

name: OpenTelemetry
summary: Open standard for generating and exporting telemetry data (traces, metrics, logs).

name: PostgreSQL
summary: Open source relational database system.

name: Neon
summary: Serverless Postgres with branching and autoscaling.

name: Supabase
summary: Backend platform built around Postgres with auth, storage, and edge functions.

name: Cloudflare Workers
summary: Edge compute platform for running JavaScript/TypeScript close to users.

name: Fly.io
summary: Platform for running apps close to users with region-based deployment and containers.

name: Render
summary: Cloud platform for deploying web services, background workers, and databases.

name: GitHub Actions
summary: CI/CD automation for building, testing, and deploying workflows from GitHub repositories.

name: Playwright
summary: Browser automation library for end-to-end testing across Chromium, Firefox, and WebKit.

name: Jest
summary: JavaScript testing framework for unit and integration tests.

name: Vitest
summary: Vite-native test runner for unit and integration tests.

name: Zod
summary: TypeScript-first schema validation library.

name: Ajv
summary: JSON Schema validator for JavaScript and TypeScript.

name: Next.js
summary: React framework with server components, routing, and build tooling.

name: React
summary: JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

name: TypeScript
summary: Typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.

name: Node.js
summary: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome’s V8 engine.

name: Stripe
summary: Payments platform offering APIs for payments, billing, and subscriptions.

name: Auth0
summary: Authentication and authorization platform with SDKs and enterprise features.

name: Clerk
summary: User management and authentication service for web apps.

name: Keycloak
summary: Open source identity and access management solution.
